scripts.refresh:all: npm run fetch:fixtures && npm run fetch:events && npm run refresh:epl2025
scripts.refresh:smart: npm run gate:refresh | tee /dev/stderr | node -e "let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{if(d.includes('REFRESH=1')) process.exit(0); console.log('Gate: skip refresh'); process.exit(42);});" && npm run refresh:all
scripts.update:matchdays: npm run fetch:events && npm run refresh:epl2025
scripts.build:prerender: npm run build && npm run prerender && npm run sitemap
